text: The 1991–92 FIS Cross-Country World Cup was the 11th official World Cup season in cross-country skiing for men and ladies. The World Cup started in Silver Star, Canada, from 8 December 1991 and finished in Vang, Norway, on 14 March 1992. Bjørn Dæhlie of Norway won the overall men's cup and Yelena Vyalbe of Russia won the women's. ==Calendar== ===Men=== {| bgcolor="#f7f8ff" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" border="1" style="font-size: 90%;
